Game Information:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Divinity: Original Sin - the new issue of the famous series of role-playing 
games from Larian Studios, leading chronicle of amazing fantasy world Rivellon. 
Plot Divinity: Original Sin precedes all the previously described events and talks 
about ancient times and that monstrous threat faced by Rivellon the dawn of its 
existence. Collect true friends and go to an unprecedented adventure! Unite to 
discuss a plan of action together fight the enemies in tactical turn-based battles, 
explore the open world of interaction and change it by their actions. And then - 
create a new adventure in a convenient editor and share it with the world!
